TopicTitle: Am I the only one who doesnt use mechjeb?

Articles.Content: I don't use it, although I may use it to accuretly do the voyager mission with the node editor.

Creating the best pilot in all time who is then transported into the far future to fight a galactic menace.

But it proves to be too much for him to handle alone, forcing him to reluctantly team up with Commander Shepard and Jebediah Kerman, as well as four other random strangers.

...You know, I think this could actually go places.
Creating the best pilot in all time who is then transported into the far future to fight a galactic menace.

DEATHBLOSSOM

I was thinking that or Starbuck.

All three suggestions are quite fitting. Now we need one last one to round out the whole team...

Heya there

I guess with those last couple of posts we can safely assume that this thread has run its course now. All that is to be said has been said, and we all know that this is an old but ever-reappearing topic. So, let's lock it then, shall we.

FEichinger
